question: What is a key characteristic that distinguishes agentic AI from generative AI?
options: Agentic AI generates higher-quality text outputs than generative AI
Agentic AI takes proactive actions toward goals with minimal human input
Agentic AI only responds to prompts without further processing
Agentic AI is limited to generating text and images
correct_answer: Agentic AI takes proactive actions toward goals with minimal human input
explanation: Agentic AI is designed to take initiative and perform tasks autonomously, unlike generative AI which typically requires prompts.
